room_title: Escape room "Do Not Disturb" by Breakout Games - Minneapolis in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: This was super fun! It was the 2nd time doing an Escape Room for most of us! This room is very small, so I would say no more than 6 people should be in this one! It was a little dark and hard to see things. They did provide a flash light, but 2 would have been nice for our group! We had to ask for a few clues because there were a few things that were pretty difficult and the guy that worked there told us this was one of the more difficult rooms in the place! We had a Groupon, so the price was cheaper! It is in the Ridgedale Mall on the first level, right by JC Penney! We would go back there again to try another room!

room_title: Escape room "Do Not Disturb" by Breakout Games - Minneapolis in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: I've done both Hostage and Do Not Disturb rooms - both were very fun and very different. Only concern is the size of the rooms seems pretty small to be comfortable for 6-7 people, 4-5 feels more accurate.

room_title: Escape room "Do Not Disturb" by Breakout Games - Minneapolis in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: Went for my friends 17th birthday and it was so fun! The workers are really polite but kinda awkward and gave us clues without us asking. Iâ€™ve been here three times and the first two we did were museum heist and hostage. They were amazing.

room_title: Escape room "Do Not Disturb" by Breakout Games - Minneapolis in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: I have done about a dozen different escape rooms and I can honestly say Breakout is my favorite. The rooms are so well planned out and have the best mix of task difficulty per room. I would say about a third of the tasks are fairly easy and the other two thirds moderate or difficult. I believe this is important because the percentage of easy tasks makes you feel like you're making progress instead of spending a lot of time on a difficult task just to unlock another difficult task that may stump you.The staff is very helpful. I just completed the new Do not Disturb room. Breakout has raised the bar with this new room and has created an escape room unlike any other.
